Anil Ambani has been summoned for questioning, and a lookout circular has been issued against him.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/fake-guarantee-ed-arrests-btpls-partha-biswal-will-confront-him-with-anil-questioning-likely-on-august-6/articleshow/123068429.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/fake-guarantee-ed-arrests-btpls-partha-biswal-will-confront-him-with-anil-questioning-likely-on-august-6/articleshow/123068429.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 02:00:27 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="17138" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123070836,imgsize-17138.cms"/></item><item><title>'He has his reasons': Tharoor sidesteps Rahul Gandhi's 'dead economy' remark; raises trade concerns</title><description><![CDATA[Shashi Tharoor declined to comment on Rahul Gandhi's agreement with Donald Trump's assessment of the Indian economy. He urged support for negotiators to secure a fair deal for India and advocated for exploring alternative export regions.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/he-has-his-reasons-shashi-tharoor-sidesteps-rahul-gandhis-dead-economy-remark-raises-trade-concerns/articleshow/123071146.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/he-has-his-reasons-shashi-tharoor-sidesteps-rahul-gandhis-dead-economy-remark-raises-trade-concerns/articleshow/123071146.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 08:34:44 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1169539" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123071240,imgsize-1169539.cms"/></item><item><title>Prajwal Revanna case: SIT chief says ‘survivor stood like a rock’</title><description><![CDATA[SIT chief BK Singh commended the rape survivor's resilience in the Prajwal Revanna case, highlighting her crucial testimony despite the four-year gap since the offences. The investigation involved extensive evidence and witnesses, with officials affirming no external interference. The swift judicial process led to Prajwal's conviction on all counts within just over a year.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bengaluru/survivor-stood-like-a-rock-sit-chief-on-prajwal-rape-case/articleshow/123067902.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bengaluru/survivor-stood-like-a-rock-sit-chief-on-prajwal-rape-case/articleshow/123067902.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 00:37:59 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>RAJIV KALKOD</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="23116" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123071229,imgsize-23116.cms"/></item><item><title>Mid-air assault: Man slapped during ‘panic attack’ on IndiGo flight found</title><description><![CDATA[IndiGo has banned a passenger from its flights for 30 days after he assaulted a co-passenger on a Mumbai-Kolkata flight. The incident, which involved Hafijul Rahaman slapping Hossain Ahmed Majumder, occurred after Majumder experienced a panic attack. Police are investigating, and other airlines may also impose no-fly restrictions. Majumder is currently traveling back home to Cachar by train.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/guwahati/missing-silchar-man-on-way-home-indigo-put-his-assaulter-on-no-fly-list/articleshow/123066622.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/guwahati/missing-silchar-man-on-way-home-indigo-put-his-assaulter-on-no-fly-list/articleshow/123066622.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 07:01:33 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="5199" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123070793,imgsize-5199.cms"/></item><item><title>Watch: Hilarious! Jadeja asks England crowd to change t-shirt during IND vs ENG 5th Test</title><description><![CDATA[During the fifth Test at The Oval, Ravindra Jadeja playfully requested a spectator to change his red t-shirt, which was interfering with his sightline. The fan obliged, earning cheers and a thumbs-up from Jadeja. Meanwhile, India dominated Day 3, propelled by Yashasvi Jaiswal's century and crucial lower-order runs, setting England a challenging target.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/watch-hilarious-ravindra-jadeja-asks-england-crowd-to-change-t-shirt-during-ind-vs-eng-5th-test/articleshow/123071038.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/watch-hilarious-ravindra-jadeja-asks-england-crowd-to-change-t-shirt-during-ind-vs-eng-5th-test/articleshow/123071038.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 09:31:03 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="52996" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123071597,imgsize-52996.cms"/></item><item><title>Mark Zuckerberg meets 24-yr-old AI researcher who rejected Meta's $125m job offer</title><description><![CDATA[Meta's aggressive pursuit of AI dominance led them to recruit 24-year-old Matt Deitke, initially offering $125 million, which he declined. Zuckerberg's personal intervention resulted in a revised $250 million package, including potential $100 million in the first year. Deitke, known for his work on Molmo and founding Vercept, is a highly sought-after AI talent.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/mark-zuckerberg-meets-24-year-old-ai-researcher-who-rejected-metas-125-million-job-offer-and-then-/articleshow/123058105.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/mark-zuckerberg-meets-24-year-old-ai-researcher-who-rejected-metas-125-million-job-offer-and-then-/articleshow/123058105.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 12:36:30 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="23578" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123058081,imgsize-23578.cms"/></item><item><title>J&K: Op Akhal enters Day 3; at least one terrorist killed during encounter</title><description><![CDATA[In Jammu and Kashmir's Kulgam district, security forces initiated Operation Akhal, resulting in the neutralization of one terrorist. The operation, a joint effort by the Army, J&K Police, and Special Operations Group, targeted the Akhal Khulsan forest area following intelligence inputs. Ongoing operations aim to dismantle the broader ecosystem of terrorism, including targeting drug smuggling and overground workers.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/jk-operation-akhal-enters-day-3-at-least-one-terrorist-killed-during-encounter-with-security-forces/articleshow/123071553.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/jk-operation-akhal-enters-day-3-at-least-one-terrorist-killed-during-encounter-with-security-forces/articleshow/123071553.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 09:23:14 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="474616" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123071549,imgsize-474616.cms"/></item><item><title>IND vs ENG 5th Test: Sunil Gavaskar surprises Shubman Gill – Watch</title><description><![CDATA[Shubman Gill received a special shirt and cap from Sunil Gavaskar after falling short of breaking Gavaskar's Test series record. Gill scored 754 runs in the series, just 20 shy of the record. Gavaskar presented the gifts to encourage Gill to aim for the record in future series.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-5th-test-sunil-gavaskar-surprises-shubman-gill-with-a-thoughtful-gift-and-a-promise-watch-the-wholesome-moment/articleshow/123070996.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-5th-test-sunil-gavaskar-surprises-shubman-gill-with-a-thoughtful-gift-and-a-promise-watch-the-wholesome-moment/articleshow/123070996.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 07:50:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="97366" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123071012,imgsize-97366.cms"/></item><item><title>Ancient Hindu idols unearthed in J&K's Anantnag district</title><description><![CDATA[During a spring restoration in Anantnag, Jammu and Kashmir, ancient Hindu idols and Shivlings were discovered, potentially linked to the Karkoota dynasty. The artefacts, found at the Karkoot Nag spring, are now under the care of the Department of Archives, Archaeology and Museums for study.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/srinagar/ancient-hindu-idols-unearthed-in-jks-anantnag-district/articleshow/123071305.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/srinagar/ancient-hindu-idols-unearthed-in-jks-anantnag-district/articleshow/123071305.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 08:54:23 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI CITY DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="105206" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123071319,imgsize-105206.cms"/></item><item><title>OpenAI executive to students: 'Studying computer science is…'</title><description><![CDATA[OpenAI chairman Bret Taylor asserts that computer science degrees remain invaluable, fostering 'systems thinking' crucial for product development, a skill AI can't replicate. Programming will remain a human job for at least a century.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/openai-executive-to-students-studying-computer-science-is/articleshow/123060047.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/openai-executive-to-students-studying-computer-science-is/articleshow/123060047.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 15:07:02 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="17138" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123060043,imgsize-17138.cms"/></item><item><title>Happy friendship day 2025: 40+wishes, images, messages, quotes, pictures and greeting cards</title><description><![CDATA[Friendship Day, celebrated on the first Sunday of August, is a special occasion to appreciate the cherished bonds we share with our friends. BJP leaders and Jaitley's son strongly refuted the claim, citing Jaitley's death in 2019, before the laws were introduced. Rohan Jaitley emphasized his father's democratic nature and belief in consensus-building. Nirmala Sitharaman criticized Gandhi's statement as irresponsible, while Dharmendra Pradhan condemned it as insensitive and false.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/rahul-claims-jaitley-threat-over-farm-laws-late-mins-son-hits-back/articleshow/123068247.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/rahul-claims-jaitley-threat-over-farm-laws-late-mins-son-hits-back/articleshow/123068247.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 01:12:09 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="7964" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123068249,imgsize-7964.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

      <title><![CDATA[SuperK to use ₹100 crore Series B funding to deepen presence in small-town India]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/startup/retail-startup-superk-series-b-funding-expansion-small-town-india-19644892.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[SuperK plans to use its ₹100 crore Series B funding to deepen its presence in Andhra Pradesh, Telangana, and Karnataka, rather than expanding nationwide. “We’re not trying to expand everywhere… the market we’re operating in already has immense depth,” said Neeraj Menta, Co-Founder of SuperK. The value-led retail chain, backed by Binny Bansal and Shubman Gill, will invest in team, tech, and brand-building to scale its small-town retail ecosystem.]]></description>
      <pubDate><![CDATA[Mon, 28 Jul 2025 23:23:16 +0530]]></pubDate>
      <dc:creator>Swapnil Deshpande</dc:creator>

    <item>
      <title><![CDATA[No interim US-India trade deal yet; Indian exporters brace for 20-25% tariffs as August 1 deadline nears]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/world/india-us-trade-deal-delay-trump-tariffs-impact-exporters-19644819.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Indian exporters are gearing up for possible US tariffs of 20–25% as the August 1 deadline set by President Trump approaches without an interim trade deal. While the tariff uncertainty has stalled orders, industry leaders say Indian exporters remain competitively placed compared to rivals like Bangladesh and China. Exporters expect the tariffs to impact profit margins more than supply chains, with fresh orders likely once clarity emerges post-deadline. Trade talks are set to resume in August as both countries work toward a broader agreement.]]></description>
      <pubDate><![CDATA[Mon, 28 Jul 2025 23:11:22 +0530]]></pubDate>
      <dc:creator>Swapnil Deshpande</dc:creator>

      <media:content height="675" width="1200" medium="image" url="https://images.cnbctv18.com/uploads/2021/03/IndiaUS_flag.jpg"/>
    </item>

      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/auto/india-ev-growth-strategy-startups-tech-innovation-product-proportion-pricing-rajeev-chaba-19643801.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[India’s electric vehicle (EV) growth story depends on getting the “three Ps” right—product, proportion, and pricing—says Rajeev Chaba, CEO Emeritus of JSW MG Motor India. Experts at a CNBC-TV18 panel discussion also highlighted the need for affordable compact EVs, indigenous motor technologies, and stronger support for startups to accelerate adoption and meet the country’s 2030 EV targets.]]></description>

      <description><![CDATA[India’s electric vehicle (EV) revolution is accelerating, fueled by the recent India–UK free trade agreement (FTA) and Tesla’s entry into the market, says industry veteran Pawan Goenka.
